title: First Hello
description: The day we first met and talked for hours. I knew there was something special about you from that very first conversation.

title: First Date
description: Our first official date at that little caf√© downtown. You wore that beautiful blue dress and my heart skipped a beat.

title: First Kiss
description: Under the stars in the park, our first kiss. Time seemed to stop and everything felt perfect in that moment.

title: Made It Official
description: The day you said yes to being my girlfriend. I was so nervous but so happy when you smiled and said yes.

title: First 'I Love You'
description: Three little words that changed everything. I meant every syllable and I still do, more than ever.

title: First Trip Together
description: Our weekend getaway to the mountains. We talked, laughed, and fell even more in love with each other.

title: First Fight & Makeup
description: Our first real argument and how we worked through it together. It made our bond even stronger.

title: Meeting the Family
description: The day I met your family and they welcomed me with open arms. It felt like home.
